question.question-text: The word which in paragraph 1 refers to
question.explain-text: The passage mentions the natural conditions in which the archeological remains are found. From this context, it can be determined that which refers to conditions. The last answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word remains in paragraph 1 is closest in meaning to
question.explain-text: The passage mentions the natural conditions in which the archeological remains are found. From this context, it can be determined that remains is closest in meaning to remnants. The first answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word themselves in paragraph 1 refers to
question.explain-text: The passage states that certain types of natural conditions favor preservation…and therefore lend themselves to sheltering. From this context, it can be determined that themselves refers to certain types. The second answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word poor in paragraph 1 could best be replaced by
question.explain-text: The passage states that preservation of the organic material…is quite poor. From this context, it can be determined that poor could best be replaced by inadequate. The third answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word those in paragraph 1 refers to
question.explain-text: The passage states that wetland archeological sites are sites such as those found in lakes, swamps, marshes, and bogs. From this context, it can be determined that those refers to sites. The first answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word bogs in paragraph 1 is closest in meaning to
question.explain-text: The passage mentions sites such as those found in lakes, swamps, marshes, and bogs and later mentions these wetland archeological sites. From this context, it can be determined that bogs are muddy areas. The third answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The phrase this type in paragraph 2 refers to

answer-text.exp: textiles, leather, basketry, wood, and plant remains

question.explain-text: The passage mentions organic materials, such as textiles, leather, basketry, wood, and plant remains and later mentions this type of organic material. From this context, it can be determined that this type refers to textiles, leather, basketry, wood, and plant remains. The first answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word rich in paragraph 2 could best be replaced by
question.explain-text: The passage mentions rich sources of evidence. From this context, it can be determined that rich could best be replaced by substantial. The second answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word they in paragraph 3 refers to
question.explain-text: The passage states that organic finds…deteriorate rapidly when they are removed. From this context, it can be determined that they refers to organic finds. The last answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word which in paragraph 3 refers to
question.explain-text: The passage mentions the huge cost…, which has been estimated to be quadruple the cost. From this context, it can be determined that which refers to huge cost. The third answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word quadruple in paragraph 3 is closest in meaning to
question.explain-text: The passage mentions the huge cost of wetland archeology, which has been estimated to be quadruple the cost of dryland archeology. From this context, it can be determined that quadruple is closest in meaning to four times. The last answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The phrase kept alive in paragraph 4 is closest in meaning to
question.explain-text: The passage states that memories of the village were kept alive by descendants. From this context, it can be determined that kept alive is closest in meaning to maintained. The second answer is therefore the best answer to this question.

question.question-text: The word harpoons in paragraph 4 is closest in meaning to
question.explain-text: The passage mentions hunting equipment such as bows and harpoons. From this context, it can be determined that harpoons is closest in meaning to spears. The first answer is therefore the best answer to this question.
